name: Evil is Back
description:
• CAMERA: First-person.
  • CONTROL: Mouse and Keyboard only.
  • GRAPHICS: Triple-b game, graphics inspired by 80's horror movies.
  • DURATION: It depends a lot on the type of player, but it's not very long (30 to 60 minutes).

...A lot...a lot...a lot of blood! strange enemies and an even stranger boss!


...Typical scenes from 80's trash movies...


...The book of death... capable of opening the portal to the world of the dead...
